ygData.subject: Re: Now about 1hs vs. 2hs Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, but you have to get them each time you log on, and that s *far* too much trouble for me.  I can maybe see if if you regularly play with a Magician
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> wrote:
> Two words for you - dimensional bags.

Yeah, but you have to get them each time you log on,
and that's *far* too much trouble for me. I can maybe
see if if you regularly play with a Magician friend,
but I don't.

I like my 8 backpacks, IMO. Sure, I get encumbered
sometimes after long sessions of hunting, but the
jingling just makes me feel better... :P

===
:D
